        <li class="li other goods" id="haojia_error" data-name="好价失效">

                    <div class="comment-main-list-item-content">
                        <!-- highlight -->
                        <div class="list-item-level1 ">
                            <!-- 昵称区域 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-header">
                                <div>
                                    <!-- 用户昵称 -->
                                    <h3>
                                        <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/member/5929840265/pinglun" target="_blank">Johnen</a>
                                    </h3>
                                    <!-- 作者标识 -->
                                                                        <!-- 用户等级 -->
                                                                            <a href="https://zhiyou.smzdm.com/user/tequan/" target="_blank">
                                            <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-level" src="https://res.smzdm.com/h5/h5_user/dist/assets/level/8.png">
                                        </a>
                                                                                                                <!-- 勋章 -->
                                        <img class="comment-main-list-item-content-header-medal" src="https://qneimg.smzdm.com/202501/15/67876f03c93aa1514.png" alt="">
                                                                    </div>
                                
                                <!-- 浮层 -->
                                <div id="actionBox" class="margin-right-15">
                                    <i class="J_more icon-more action-sheet-icon"></i>
                                    <div class="action-sheet">
                                        <a class="jubao" href="javascript:void(0);" id="report_288004381" style="display:inline-block">举报</a>
                                        <!-- 删除, 折叠评论不展示5160136894-->
                                                                            </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                            <!-- 评论内容 -->
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-comment padding-right-10">
                                <!-- 置顶标签 -->
                                                                <span>云闪付888还款券……问题是我都没有信用卡，还个鬼的款。</span>

                                        <div class="tips-down">

                                            </div>
                                            <div class="arrow">

                                        </div>
                                        <!--FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 取消点踩提示 end -->
                                    </div>
                                    <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 新增点踩按钮 end -->
                                    <!-- 回复 -->

                                </div>
                            </div>

                                <!-- 表情包及表单提交操作 -->
                                <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-textarea-opertion">
                                    <div class="comment_smileBox">

                                        <div class="smileLayerBg" id="smiley" style="display: none;"></div>
                                    </div>
                                    <div>
                                        <p>校验提示文案</p>
                                        <div class="J_submit">提交</div>
                                    </div>
                                </div>
                            </div>
                        </div>
                        <!-- 二级评论 -->
                        <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-reply">
                            <div class="comment-main-list-item-content-reply-container">

                                                    </div>
                    </div>
                </li>
                
                <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠评论说明 start -->

            </ul>
                        <!-- FS-5160136894:支持评论折叠 折叠的评论 end -->
            <!-- 分页样式 -->
            <ul class="pagination"><li><a href="#comments" class="pageCurrent pagination-item">1</a></li><li><a href="p2/#comments" class="pagination-item">2</a></li><li><a href="p3/#comments" class="pagination-item">3</a></li><li><a href="p4/#comments" class="pagination-item">4</a></li><li class="pagedown"><a href="p2/#comments" class="pagination-item"><i class="icon-angle-right-o-thin"></i></a></li><li class="jumpToPage">转至<input type="text" class="input_num" id="input_num">页</li><li><a href="javascript:void(0);" class="a_jumpTo" onclick="return on_check_comment_page(4, '', this)">GO</a></li></ul>        </div>
    </div>
    <!-- 评论列表 end -->
